entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 p.m. MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
